pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interpreting CoDa Regression Models // Provides methods for interpreting CoDa (Compositional Data) regression models along the lines of "Pairwise share ratio interpretations of compositional regression models" (Dargel and Thomas-Agnan 2024) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2024.107945. The new methods include variation scenarios, elasticities, elasticity differences and share ratio elasticities. These tools are independent of log- ratio transformations and allow an interpretation in the original space of shares. 'CoDaImpact' is designed to be used with the 'compositions' package and its ecosystem.
